text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——I see. 
A 『Buddy Beach Volleyball Competition』 is it?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
This is something we have no choice but to participate in. 
Now is the time to show the world the strength of our bond.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
With the power of my 『Holy Sword』, 
I shall offer up this victory to my lord!

And so, in the middle of the long summer training camp, 
we decided to participate in a local event, however——
(Shhhhhhhh——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: The heavens weep……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
With this, it seems it will be unlikely for the tournament to 
continue. It's almost as if the heavens seek to prevent the conflict——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
By dedicating my victory to my lord, it was 
meant to be an auspicious day. How regretful……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ……It was a chance to perform well and be praised too.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——Oh, sorry about my phone. Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——Eh? Is that true? The forecast said it would be until night. Okay. 
So you're thinking of something other than beach volleyball? I see.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: So instead of that, what are——Eh?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……No, it's nothing. 
I understand.

As predicted by the forecast, the rain stopped by nightfall. 
However, it would be difficult to play at night so instead——

text_block_list.name: Academy Staff
text_block_list.text:
Everyone participating in the Test of Courage～ 
The entrance is right this way～!
choice_data_list: Looks like it's started. Let's go!
Looks like it's started. Let's go!

text_block_list.text:
A Test of Courage was proposed as an alternative. 
And the forest at night time was filled with a spooky atmosphere——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(It's so dark…… 
It feels as if something like a Dullahan could appear……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(No……how can I be afraid!? 
As a knight, I need to protect my "King"——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——My lord. Visibility is quite poor 
and I'm sure you're feeling anxious.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
But worry not. No matter what danger approaches, 
this Durandal will dispel it without fail!
choice_data_list: The staff is here, it'll be fine

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes. ……No, there's always a chance something could happen. 
At that time, never leave my——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……Pardon me. 
It seems like that was just the wind.

It seemed kind of strange that she was so tense. 
Then I noticed that her hands were shaking.

Normally, Durandal had a dignified presence but, 
it wouldn't be strange if she had fears just like anyone else.

She probably couldn't say it out loud though. 
Her knightly pride wouldn't allow it. In that case——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……It'll be fine. There's nothing to be afraid of. I'm a knight. 
More courageous than anyone, stronger than anyone——

I must have surprised her, but I didn't let it stop me from 
calling out to her. What I needed to do was just to cheer her up.
choice_data_list: There's nobody that can beat you!
There's nobody that can beat you!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-dono……
choice_data_list: With you here, there's nothing to fear!
With you here, there's nothing to fear!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Just leave it to me, my lord. 
It's because of you that I can become the strongest sword.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Now, on my back. This darkness, 
I'll show you my 『Holy Sword』 can cut right through it!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Hold on tight. 
——Haaaaaaaaa!!!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa——
choice_data_list: Amazing! We made it here so fast!
Amazing! We made it here so fast!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Of course…… 
With my 『Holy Sword』 something like that forest is——
choice_data_list: Now we just need to reach the cave!
Now we just need to reach the cave!

text_block_list.text:
As soon as I said that, Durandal's eyes wavered for 
a moment. But, the Test of Courage wasn't complete 
until we grabbed the charm from the cave ahead.

It would be darker than the forest and more difficult 
to run in. Up to this point, I'd respected her wishes——
choice_data_list: (Maybe it would be better to stop……?)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: …………Trainer-dono……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I've resolved myself. No matter what hardships 
lie ahead, I will protect my lord with all I have.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
However, up ahead it's darker, and harder to see your foothold. 
For your safety, please grant me the honor of leading you.

I'm sure what she meant was 『I want to hold your hand because 
it's scary』. Seeing her expression made me feel a little guilty.
choice_data_list: (I wish she could just rely on me. But——)

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
In the future, if someone who looks down on her dream 
were to appear, you alone cannot turn away from her.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Trainers are the supporting pillars to an Uma Musume's dream. 
Never forget that you are their "Steadfast Guide".

Her dream was to become a proud and steadfast knight. 
Which means, there's no reason to act like she isn't already one.
(Squeeze……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……Thank you, my lord. 
I won't let go of this hand.

In the end, it took us a long time to reach the 
goal. We only ended up receiving a participation 
trophy for the 『Test of Courage Competition』——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for not being strong enough. 
I will reflect on this and continue to strive forth in the future.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: (……Their hand was so warm……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: (As I thought, if I'm with Trainer-dono……)

Together, the two of us overcame that darkness. 
Perhaps the distance between us had narrowed just a little.
